name: RainonDeck
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Deck”
”Alexa ask Rain on Deck to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on deck
des:
Simulates the sound of rain falling on a wooden deck. The distinctive pitter-patter of raindrops on wood creates a cozy and relaxing soundscape, suitable for unwinding after a long day or for background noise while reading or studying.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Deck
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
